alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS EXPECTED ACROSS GILA...MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions are favorable for the development of scattered thunderstorms this evening. Some storms may become strong to possibly severe. Wind gusts up to 50 mph will be possible. Strong, gusty winds will be capable of producing areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Florence, Coolidge, Globe, Superior, Hayden, Christmas, Gold Canyon, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Roosevelt, Round Valley, Miami, La Palma, Gold Camp, Roosevelt Dam, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Top-Of-The-World, and Florence Junction. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
